name: International Monetary Fund (IMF)
description:
{"dataPublishedBy": "United Nations Statistics Division", "dataPublisherSource": "International Monetary Fund (IMF)", "link": "https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/indicators/database/", "retrievedDate": "2022-02-17", "additionalInfo": "Variable description: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services (%) 
 
 Variable code: DT_TDS_DECT 
 
 Metadata available at: https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/metadata/files/Metadata-17-04-01.pdf 
 
 Detailed sources: Debt service is the sum of principle repayments and interest actually paid in currency, goods, or services. This series differs from the standard debt to exports series. It covers only long-term public and publicly guaranteed debt and repayments (repurchases and charges) to the IMF. Exports of goods and services include primary income, but do not include workers' remittances."}

The sample excludes the population of the Moscow municipal area. Programme for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies (PIAAC) Data extracted on 13 April 2021. name: Data from multiple sources compiled by the UN
description:
{"dataPublishedBy": "United Nations Statistics Division", "dataPublisherSource": "Data from multiple sources compiled by the UN", "link": "https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/indicators/database/", "retrievedDate": "2022-02-17", "additionalInfo": "Variable description: Proportion of population achieving at least a fixed level of proficiency in functional skills, by sex, age and type of skill (%) 
 
 Variable code: SE_ADT_FUNS 
 
 Metadata available at: https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/metadata/files/Metadata-04-06-01.pdf 
 
 Detailed sources: UNESCO Institute for Statistics.  Data extracted on 13 April 2021. Programme for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies (PIAAC) Data extracted on 13 April 2021. National Assessment (NA): Literacy Assessment Survey (LAS); Proficient = Literate and Advanced; Literate at Initial Level; Not Proficient = SemiLiterate, NonLiterate Data extracted on 13 April 2021. Skills Towards Employability and Productivity (STEP) of World Bank Data extracted on 13 April 2021. Flemish Region only. Programme for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies (PIAAC) Data extracted on 13 April 2021. National Assessment (NA): Literacy Assessment and Monitoring Programme (LAMP); Proficient = Level 3, Level 2; Not Proficient = Level 1; Combination of Prose and Documents Data extracted on 13 April 2021. National Assessment (NA): Literacy Assessment and Monitoring Programme (LAMP); Proficient = Level 3, Level 2; Not Proficient = Level 1 Data extracted on 13 April 2021. National Assessment (NA): Kenya National Adult Literacy Survey Report 2007; Proficient = Level 5, Level 4, Level 3; Not Proficient = Level 2, Level 1, Level 0 Data extracted on 13 April 2021. National Assessment (NA): Functional Literacy, Education and Mass Media Survey (FLEMMS); Proficient = Level 4, Level 3, Level 2, Level 1; Not Proficient = Level 0, Undetermined Data extracted on 13 April 2021. The sample excludes the population of the Moscow municipal area. Programme for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies (PIAAC) Data extracted on 13 April 2021. National Assessment (NA): General Household Survey; Proficient = No Difficulty, Some Difficulty, A lot of Difficulty (calculation for change in rand); Not Proficient = Unable to Do (calculation for change in rand) Data extracted on 13 April 2021. National Assessment (NA): General Household Survey; Proficient = Completion of Grade 7 or Higher; Not Proficient = Completion up to Grade 8 Data extracted on 13 April 2021. National Assessment (NA): General Household Survey; Proficient = Completion of Grade 7 or Higher; Not Proficient = Completion up to Grade 7 Data extracted on 13 April 2021. National Assessment (NA): General Household Survey; Proficient = Completion of Grade 7 or Higher; Not Proficient = Completion up to Grade 9 Data extracted on 13 April 2021. England country only. Programme for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies (PIAAC) Data extracted on 13 April 2021. Household Surveys Data extracted on 13 April 2021."}

 Detailed sources: ILO modelled estimates, November 2020, available in ILOSTAT (https://ilostat.ilo.org/). For the specific sources by country and the estimation methodology refer to ILOSTAT directly. AFG - HIES - Living Condition Survey ALB - OE - Official Estimates ALB - LFS - Labour Force Survey DZA - LFS - Household Employment Survey AGO - HIES - Core Welfare Indicators Questionnaire AGO - LFS - Angola Employment Survey AGO - PC - Population Census ATG - PC - Population Census ATG - OE - Official Estimates AZE - OE - Official Estimates AZE - LFS - Labour Force Survey ARG - LFS - Permanent Household Survey (Urban) AUS - LFS - Labour Force Survey AUT - LFS - EU Labour Force Survey BHS - LFS - Labour Force & Household Survey BHR - PC - Population Census BHR - OE - Estimates of Central informatics organization BGD - LFS - Labour Force Survey ARM - OE - Official Estimates ARM - LFS - Household Labour Force Survey ARM - HIES - Households' Integrated Living Conditions Survey LFS - Labour Force Survey BRB - LFS - Labour Force Survey BEL - LFS - EU Labour Force Survey BTN - PC - Population Census BTN - LFS - Labour Force Survey Report BOL - LFS - Continuous Employment Survey BOL - HIES - Household Survey BIH - LFS - Labour Force Survey BWA - Not a separate reporting unit in FAOSTAT where it is included in Australia. Data from Website. Data from FAOSTAT updated 20210305 FAO Estimate based on data from FAOSTAT for year 2010 Not in FAOSTAT. Data from Website. Not a separate reporting unit in FAOSTAT where it is included under Finland. Data from Website. Not in FAOSTAT. Data from Website. Excludes the part on the Antarctic continent FAO Estimate based on data from FAOSTAT for year 2016 FAO Estimate based on data from FAOSTAT for year 2015 FAOSTAT data minus land area of Svalbard and Jan Mayen islands Not in FAOSTAT. Data from national website (Statistics Norway) Not in FAOSTAT. Data fron national website. Refers to the Bailiwick of Guernsey, which includes the island of Guernsey, SARK and some minor islands, same as in FRA 2015 and previous SDG submissions Not in FAOSTAT. Data from national website"}
